Controlling Visuals with Arkaos and BASE

Posted by: Livid Instruments , April 20, 2014

This video shows the possibilities of controlling visuals with Arkaos Grand VJ and the BASE MIDI Controller. Use the pads to trigger visuals, control effects, and more. This is a powerful combination for creating real-time expressive visuals. Music by Kendall Clark.

Tags: Arkaos GrandVJ Tutorials, Tutorials

Share!
Tweet

Livid Instruments

About the author

Livid Instruments has been crafting custom controllers in Austin, Texas since 2004, and offers a line of commercially available control surfaces and DIY products through dealers and distributors worldwide. www.lividinstruments.com
